audit-policy
************


Description
===========

The resource represents all available audit policies relevant for the
target database with their corresponding audit conditions. The audit
policies could be in any one of the following 3 states in the target
database 1) Created and enabled 2) Created but not enabled 3) Not
created For more details on available audit policies, refer to
documentation.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* get

* provision

* retrieve

* update
